Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Are we still not connecting to Commandant's comms?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "(Nods) Commandant's location has stopped at the edge of City 015, 16 degrees away from the designated route.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Lucia... should we...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Lucia shakes her head and puts her hand on Liv's shoulder."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Don't be rash. Let's wait for our order.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Butâ€”I... understand.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Lucia's presence silently passes to Liv through her touch, and Liv calms down."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Lee, keep tracking.', 4: '3'}
{3: 'Understanding what Lucia intends, Lee nods and leaves the laboratory.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The laboratory quiets down again. The two remaining Gray Ravens turn their gazes back to the occupied researcher in the room.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Even though I can't see you, you know you are staring, right?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Asimov talks while his eyes still focus on the complicated projection in front of him.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Asimov, we are waiting for our order.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "I'm not Hassen. I can't just find a bunch of random missions in my pocket and assign them to you, can I?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Although... hmm... There is something that concerns me.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: '...Something that concerns you? Is Commandant...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What are you talking about?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "The last time we detected this signal... Wasn't that a while ago, Asimov?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Hush. We'll talk about that later. The source... if we can locate the source of the signal... This is a remarkable discovery...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Asimov holds his finger to his lips and shushes them.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Could it be...?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "...No, we're lacking some crucial data. But if we relocate the CUB, maybe we can...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'What kind of crucial data? Maybe... we can help?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'But Asimov has stopped talking.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I guess Asimov is back into his researcher mode...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's leave him be.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Okay... Lucia, I'm worried... This is the first time Commandant goes on a mission this long on Earth alone...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Don't worry. Commandant knows how to be careful. Plus, with Lee, you, and me here, we'll never let anything happen to Commandant.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Liv, let's focus on the task at hand. This is all we can do for now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Understood! I know I can always count on you, Lucia...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia suddenly lowers her voice and whispers to Liv.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Lee should have some new information. That way.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's their territory after all... Maybe they'll know where Commandant has gone...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'They look at each other, fully aware of who each other is talking about. They are about to leave the laboratory when Asimov stops them.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Gray Raven, hold up.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'A-Asimov, is something wrong?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "If you're so eager to find your commandant...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '(...Have Asimov found out about it?!)', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I also don't want the commandant to run into any trouble on the surface, now that so much data has been collected.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I've got a job here that just got approved to assign... I'll leave it to you.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Asimov... Thank you!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The three Gray Ravens salute Asimov, before giving each other a nod and running toward the mission rendezvous.'}
